etymology.description: phonetic 矛(矛) (máo, "spear") + semantic 攵(攵) (pū, "action") = action related to spear
etymology.interpretation: 敄(wù) combines 矛(矛) (máo, "spear") as the phonetic component and 攵(攵) (pū, "action") as the semantic component to convey the meaning of an action involving a spear.
